items.title: Robert Redford, Sundance Founder and Oscar-Winning Actor, Dies at 89
items.description: Redford became a patriarch of the independent film movement in the 1980s through his Sundance Institute and film festival.

items.title: Duolingo Scores Are Coming to LinkedIn. It Could Change Hiring Forever
items.description: The language learning app Duolingo has partnered with LinkedIn so users can showcase their real-time scores to peers and recruiters.

items.title: Customer Churn Is a Company-Wide Problem. Here’s How to Address It
items.description: Customer churn is not, and never was, solely a CS problem. It’s a fundamental company problem.

items.title: Why Being More Human Is Your Brand’s Biggest Asset in 2025 and Beyond
items.description: In a time of major technological developments, there’s a real benefit to maintaining a more personal connection with customers.

items.title: 5 Rules to Prevent Bots and Assistants From Hurting Your Business
